name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_7cc556ec-e67f-43c5-9861-f5cff5b4cc5e
text:
rule PowerShell_code_executed_directly_from_web {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "PowerShell_code_executed_directly_from_web"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Execution"
    mitre_attack_technique = "Powershell"
    

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.target.process.file.full_path ="powershell.EXE"
    $e.target.process.file.full_path = /\\net\.webclient\.dll$/ nocase OR $e.target.process.file.full_path = /\\iex\.exe$/ nocase

  outcome:
    
    $risk_score = 50

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
